sets.paragraph: Investment in education produces profound societal benefits. Quality schooling ___1___ students' critical thinking abilities and prepares them for complex careers. sets.paragraph: Preventive healthcare offers superior outcomes compared to reactive treatment. Early screening programs ___1___ detection of diseases before symptoms appear.
